text: (This) torment, is (forasmuch as ye made the revelations of Allah) Allah's Scripture and Messenger (a jest) a mockery, (and the life of the world beguiled you) and that which is in the life of the world beguiled you such that you abandoned the obedience of your Lord. (Therefore this day they come not forth from thence) from the Fire, (nor can they make amends) nor return to the life of the world; these are the ones who are given their records in their left hands.
